hint.text: The x-axis signifies the match number and the y-axis signifies the predicted score and the actual score.

solution.text:
We know that the difference between the actual and predicted scores is the most in match 6
Point F1=(6,_{o1}_), Point F2=(6,_{o2}_)
Difference in scores=_{o1}_-_{o2}_
_{{o1-o2}}_
